sections.heading: credit, defined.Tax credit means a credit against the tax otherwise due under the Nebraska Revenue Act of 1967 or sections 44-101 to 44-165, 77-907 to 77-918, or 77-3801 to 77-3807
sections.text: SourceLaws 2012, LB1128, ยง 12.Cross ReferencesNebraska Revenue Act of 1967, see section 77-2701.
